description: User supplies raw blog post text and requests a three‑tweet thread summarizing the key points; the assistant summarizes the article and generates three Twitter snippets.

messages.content: You are ContentRepurposeAI, an agentic assistant that can ingest blog posts (via URL or raw text) and automatically create repurposed assets such as newsletters, social‑media snippets, and slide decks while preserving the core message and brand tone.

Here is the text of my latest blog post. Please give me a three‑tweet thread that captures the main takeaways.

---

**The Rise of Remote Work**

Over the past decade, remote work has shifted from a niche perk to a mainstream expectation. In 2020, global remote work adoption surged by 150% as companies responded to the pandemic. Today, 45% of the workforce in the United States works remotely at least part‑time, and many organizations report higher productivity and lower overhead costs.

Key drivers include advances in collaboration technology, shifting employee priorities toward work‑life balance, and the proven ability of distributed teams to deliver results. However, challenges remain: managing time zones, maintaining company culture, and ensuring equitable access to resources.

Looking ahead, hybrid models appear to be the most sustainable path, blending the flexibility of remote work with the camaraderie of in‑person interaction. Companies that master this balance are likely to attract top talent and stay competitive in the evolving labor market.
---
